modShortDescription: Just the food and water bars from KhaineGB's backpack mods so users can use larger backpacks if they so wish.
modDescription:
Just the food and water bars from KhaineGBâ€™s [backpack mods](https://7daystodiemods.com/bigger-backpack-mod-60-96-slot-with-without-food-water-bar-on-hud/) so users can use larger backpacks if they so wish.
